pageTitle: Itinerary for Tuesday, June 14, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Tuesday, June 14, 2016:

Ottawa

9:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Cabinet Meeting.

Note for media:

  • Ministers will be available to media in the House of Commons Foyer as of 12:00 p.m.

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.

6:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will visit the Embassy of the United States of America to sign the book of condolences for victims of the Orlando shooting.

Embassy of the United States of America
490 Sussex Drive
Ottawa, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity only.


PMO Media Relations:
Media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
613-957-5555
